thread.title: Société Générale Executive Didier Valet Resigns

author: Nathan Allen
title: Société Générale Executive Didier Valet Resigns

organizations.name: société générale executive didier valet resigns société générale sa

text:
Société Générale SA said Wednesday that Deputy Chief Executive Didier Valet has resigned to “preserve the bank’s general interest.”
Mr. Valet’s resignation is related to “a divergence of approaches regarding the management of a specific legal matter, which predates his appointment as deputy CEO,” the bank said in a statement.
